tool_description: Out API will offer you possibility to check Phone or Email if is Valid or Disposable, as well you can check IP if is a VPN or Proxy during your KYC procedures or lead registration.
name: Disposable RegData Verification
title: Disposable RegData Verification

api_list.name: IP Verification
api_list.description: Check IP details for supporting v4 and v6
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://disposable-regdata-verification.p.rapidapi.com/score/ip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "disposable-regdata-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Email Verification
api_list.description:
Verifying Email against RFC standards.
Checks if it's from a disposable/temporary email service
Checks for MX records in order to be sure that client provide correct/valid domain name.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://disposable-regdata-verification.p.rapidapi.com/score/email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "disposable-regdata-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Validate phone number
api_list.description:
Checks provided phone number for Disposable services 
As well check if phone is mentioned in public recourses which affects reputation score.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://disposable-regdata-verification.p.rapidapi.com/score/phone"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "disposable-regdata-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
